name: Surfing Master Diving Flip
description:
There is no other surfing game like this on the iPhone!
Feel the thrill, rush and excitement all at once.

Surfing Madness Brings to you the thrilling experience of real surfing .

Features:
• AWESOME GAME!
• The Best surfing game on the App Store!
• 30 super thrilling levels!!!!
• Retina Display
• Show your amazing surfing abilities!
• Addictive gameplay!
• And so much more that you can only find out playing!
